over_the_box_onboarding_description: Secure your internet access and increase your bandwidth.
over_the_box_onboarding_guide1_title: OverTheBox Plus or IT v2 installation
over_the_box_onboarding_guide1_descripti: Find out how to install and configure your OverTheBox Plus or IT v2 device to use your OverTheBox solution
over_the_box_onboarding_guide2_descripti: Looking to use a particular DNS server? This guide will help you specify your DNS server transmitted by DHCP.
